jobs.title: Digital Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Lead our digital marketing initiatives including social media campaigns, email marketing, and SEO strategies. Experience with Google Analytics, Facebook Ads, and content creation required. Join a dynamic team focused on driving growth through innovative marketing approaches.

jobs.title: Data Analyst

company.name: ProManage Solutions
